headline: Your Portfolio Is Not Ready for Retirement: 3 ETFs to Secure Your Financial Future
summary: Life insurance provider John Hancock just released its Longevity Preparedness Index, a survey to measure U.S. adults’ ability to live well in older age. It reveals a sobering reality: Americans score just 60 out of 100 in readiness for longer lifespans, with finances a glaring weak spot. As life expectancy rises — potentially doubling the ... Your Portfolio Is Not Ready for Retirement: 3 ETFs to Secure Your Financial Future
